import{configureStore}from'@reduxjs/toolkit';import authReducer from'./slices/authSlice';import transactionReducer from'./slices/transactionSlice';import salesReducer from'./slices/salesSlice';import sourcingReducer from'./slices/sourcingSlice';const store=configureStore({reducer:{auth:authReducer,transactions:transactionReducer,sales:salesReducer,sourcing:sourcingReducer}// Optional middleware & devtools config here
});export default store;
